author: drobinson
msg: Modified the inputDate component to use lightweight dialogs when they are enabled.
As consequence of this, also reworked TrPopupDialog launch js code to be more flexible, so both PPR, Date and others can use this function to launch a dialog.

author: kstam
msg: JUDDI-104, Fixing how to load a resource file for testing (workaround for surefire bug: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/SUREFIRE-286

author: joakime
msg: * Adding anonymous type constructor for ArtifactsByChecksumConstraint.
* Removing DatabaseSearch.  (We don't want a repeat of the mess that exists within continuum!)

author: mbenson
msg: document change of type eval syntax to type(arg) rather than type:arg to accommodate ns'd types
